channel.title: Game.Share.Play / TEAM NEEDED
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/20a9dsn.jpg[/img] Hello Mopar, I am creating a Community Based youtube channel called Game.Share.Play The youtube channel link is [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/GameSharePlay?feature=guide]here[/url]. Mainly the channel will post, let's plays, trailers, rsps videos, game videos, gaming news, community montages, tutorials and etc. The channel will be a place for gamers to post their videos to get them out other than just on their channel. It will create a diverse gaming community in which people can watch other games and get into things such as wow or rsps.
What I need is a team, a team that is willing to stick with the deadline for videos.
Each person will have a "show" and a playlist. Their job is to atleast once a week post a video related to their playlist.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[B]Currently this is what I need for a team.[/B]
Let's Plays: 0/2 this could easily consist of minecraft all the way up to skyrim.
Gaming news: 0/3, I will be doing gaming news also.
Montages: 0/1
Tutorials: 0/4, Any game.
Reviews: 0/4, of any game, Must have to atleast be within release of 4 months. Also can be electronics.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[B]To Apply.[/B]
Name: Age: Spot: MSN: Skype: Proof of work(montage):
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Add me if you applied, My Skype: Texizgfx MSN: [email]weplayegames@hotmail.com[/email]
